name: We Are Showtime!
description:
WELCOME TO "WE ARE SHOWTIME!"

Can you beat the show?
Ever wanted to play in a real game show? But that would mean you’d have to leave your house. With we are Showtime you can now experience being the star in a game show.
Over 20 totally different minigames
We offer a wide variety of different challenges to our contestant. Each and every of them has three different difficulties, so it will never get boring! You have to eat, smash and paint your way through the challenges
See how far you can get in endless mode
In endless mode you can challenge yourself and test your endurance. Face an unlimited amount of minigames that become faster and faster as you progress. See how far you can get and challenge your friends to beat your score.

Upgrade your backstage room with your hard earned cash
Earn money through playing different game modes and use it to upgrade your backstage room with all kind of accessories. You can also beat different challenges to unlock trophies that will be displayed as a reward.

Challenge your friends
You have friends who want to play with you? No problem! Compete for the highest score. Try to always be at your best so you can beat up to 5 friends.

See you in the next game!
